dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.doc_man, SUM(a.jan_ct) jan_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.jan_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.jan_days) / SUM(a.jan_ct), 0) END) jan_a, SUM(a.feb_ct) feb_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.feb_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.feb_days) / SUM(a.feb_ct), 0) END) feb_a, SUM(a.mar_ct) mar_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.mar_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.mar_days) / SUM(a.mar_ct), 0) END) mar_a, SUM(a.apr_ct) apr_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.apr_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.apr_days) / SUM(a.apr_ct), 0) END) apr_a, SUM(a.may_ct) may_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.may_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.may_days) / SUM(a.may_ct), 0) END) may_a, SUM(a.jun_ct) jun_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.jun_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.jun_days) / SUM(a.jun_ct), 0) END) jun_a, SUM(a.jul_ct) jul_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.jul_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.jul_days) / SUM(a.jul_ct), 0) END) jul_a, SUM(a.aug_ct) aug_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.aug_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.aug_days) / SUM(a.aug_ct), 0) END) aug_a, SUM(a.sep_ct) sep_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.sep_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.sep_days) / SUM(a.sep_ct), 0) END) sep_a, SUM(a.oct_ct) oct_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.oct_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.oct_days) / SUM(a.oct_ct), 0) END) oct_a, SUM(a.nov_ct) nov_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.nov_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.nov_days) / SUM(a.nov_ct), 0) END) nov_a, SUM(a.dec_ct) dec_t, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.dec_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.dec_days) / SUM(a.dec_ct), 0) END) dec_a FROM (SELECT DISTINCT con.contact_gid, NVL(TRIM(con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name),'BLANK DOCUMENT MANAGER') doc_man, s.shipment_gid, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) jan_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) jan_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) feb_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) feb_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) mar_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) mar_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) apr_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) apr_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) may_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) may_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) jun_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) jun_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) jul_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) jul_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) aug_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) aug_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) sep_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) sep_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) oct_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) oct_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) nov_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) nov_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) dec_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) dec_days, s.sail_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_base_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' AND sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('2083','2084','2184','2200','3311','5078','5531') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND NOT s.attribute_date7 IS NULL AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR)) a GROUP BY a.doc_man ORDER BY a.doc_man

SELECT SUM(a.jan_ct) jan_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.jan_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.jan_days) / SUM(a.jan_ct), 0) END) jan_ta, SUM(a.feb_ct) feb_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.feb_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.feb_days) / SUM(a.feb_ct), 0) END) feb_ta, SUM(a.mar_ct) mar_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.mar_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.mar_days) / SUM(a.mar_ct), 0) END) mar_ta, SUM(a.apr_ct) apr_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.apr_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.apr_days) / SUM(a.apr_ct), 0) END) apr_ta, SUM(a.may_ct) may_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.may_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.may_days) / SUM(a.may_ct), 0) END) may_ta, SUM(a.jun_ct) jun_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.jun_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.jun_days) / SUM(a.jun_ct), 0) END) jun_ta, SUM(a.jul_ct) jul_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.jul_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.jul_days) / SUM(a.jul_ct), 0) END) jul_ta, SUM(a.aug_ct) aug_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.aug_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.aug_days) / SUM(a.aug_ct), 0) END) aug_ta, SUM(a.sep_ct) sep_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.sep_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.sep_days) / SUM(a.sep_ct), 0) END) sep_ta, SUM(a.oct_ct) oct_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.oct_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.oct_days) / SUM(a.oct_ct), 0) END) oct_ta, SUM(a.nov_ct) nov_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.nov_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.nov_days) / SUM(a.nov_ct), 0) END) nov_ta, SUM(a.dec_ct) dec_tt, (CASE WHEN SUM(a.dec_ct) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(SUM(a.dec_days) / SUM(a.dec_ct), 0) END) dec_ta FROM (SELECT DISTINCT s.shipment_gid, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) jan_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 1 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) jan_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) feb_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 2 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) feb_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) mar_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 3 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) mar_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) apr_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 4 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) apr_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) may_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 5 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) may_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) jun_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 6 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) jun_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) jul_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 7 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) jul_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) aug_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 8 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) aug_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) sep_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 9 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) sep_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) oct_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 10 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) oct_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) nov_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 11 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) nov_days, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) dec_ct, (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'MM')) = 12 THEN ROUND(s.attribute_date7 - s.sail_date,0) ELSE 0 END) dec_days, s.sail_date FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_base_gid LIKE 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' AND sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('2083','2084','2184','2200','3311','5078','5531') WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND NOT s.attribute_date7 IS NULL AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date,'YYYY')) = TO_NUMBER(:YEAR)) a
